column4: Hi guys. Can someone give me a hand.. I'm attempting to configure Mutt, and I'm trying to set up fetchmail... I'm a little lost on the tutorial. It says to save a couple lines of code in the home directory.. does it mean in the Mutt MUA directory?
not to break you down, but this sounds rather mutt specific, have you tried asking for help in their channel?
I was just thinking that pathing questions are OS specific.
I sent you a private message
